Name: Data linkage
Description: Dataset is not machine-readable, well-formatted, and/or interoperable

Name: Data quality
Description: Data quality needs to be improved, validated, and/or verified

Name: Data sharing
Description: Data usage rights are unclear or restrictive

Name: Misc
Description: Challenges or gaps that do not fit into the other categories

Name: Sufficiency
Description: Dataset is missing important variables or types of information

Name: Timeliness
Description: Data is not released promptly or is otherwise out of date
